name: Mcscriffs Big Day Out
description:
[Game contains loud noise and flashing images]

When space aliens invade the super bowl and kidnap all the football players, theres only one man up to the task: Chade Mcscriff, all star quarterback! Control him in this arcade inspired expirence that is a fucking mess from top to bottom.

If you want to talk to me about this game or other projects, feel free to hit me up on twitter: https://twitter.com/bigbeandotgov
